website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for an easy-to-wear, day-to-day sandal, the Ecotread sandal is designed with smarter functionality than your average flip flop.
pros: Antimicrobial application for odor control, lasts longer than the average summer sandal
Footbed is designed to keep feet from sliding around
cons: The straps may stretch out a bit after the first few wears, and they are a tad heavier than normal flip flops

customer_reviews.title: Still solidly good flip flops, even if not as good as they use to be
customer_reviews.text: These are still great flip flops. Not quite as good as my last pair I got 10 years ago, back when Chacos still had the vibram sole on these, but still really good. Arch support and comfort are still there. The straps are a little different, but work. My only complaint is that the strap between the toes is for sure not as soft as the old ones and it took me a long time to break in/build up calluses for it. Are these as good as the old ones? No. Are they still better than so many other flip flops out there? Yes. Worth getting. Now to see if these can hold up 10 years too....
customer_reviews.author: LostTheL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Flip Flops
customer_reviews.text: I love my Chaco flip flops! I have trouble with my feet and legs and can only wear supportive shoes. These support my arches and are very comfortable. The footbed design keeps my feet from sliding around. The tread on the bottom is non-slip. I can get them dirty and wash them easily. This is my second pair, and I wear them almost daily. I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: jeepmom

customer_reviews.title: Needs more cushion at heel
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this shoe and I do except, there is no heel cushion for my spine. However they are really comfortable for house shoes and I'm keeping them. REVISED: been wearing this shoe out shopping and walking the dog every day. Love the shoes and I will buy again. No spine issues.
customer_reviews.author: Skycatcher

customer_reviews.title: These are my daily go to flip flops for 10 years
customer_reviews.text: Chaco is the only flip flop I have worn for 10 years. One pair would last ten years if I hadn’t lost the right shoe. The were recommended by my podiatrist for plantar fasciitis. I live in Florida and do not like to wear shoes so it was wonderful to Find a flip flop that is healthy for my feet. Stylish, reasonably priced and durable.
customer_reviews.author: GoGreen!

customer_reviews.title: Best flips ever
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Chaco sandals, I have a pair of hiking boots that I love. I almost sent them back after wearing them for a day. I'm glad I gave it a couple of days before doing so. Initially they were tight and I felt like the arch wasn't fitting me right. After wearing them for a couple of days they felt great.
customer_reviews.author: Mechelle

customer_reviews.title: My ‘go to’ summer footwear
customer_reviews.text: My go to everyday footwear in the summer. The arch support feels great and I can walk forever in these. The only reason I’ve had to buy another pair is that someone stole my originals from the pool. The first pair I had for five years and they still looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: they are still pretty comfortable though
customer_reviews.text: the straps stretched out quite a bit in the first week but have appeared to stabilize now. they are still pretty comfortable though. this is the 3rd pair I have owned and I will order more when these "wear out" The show doesn't actually wear out but I have really sensitive feet and wear them daily and it takes about 2-3 years before I need new ones. I may need to trade these in for a new pair within the year now that the straps are much looser
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill Slusher

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They hurt a little at first. I normally wear a 6/6.5. I went with the 7. Love the shoes wear them everywhere. Will buy again! They did smell bad after constantly wearing them. I scrubbed them down with a dawn/baking soda mix and let them sit a few days. It took a while to get all the soap out of the straps, but they done smell anymore.
customer_reviews.author: cricket

customer_reviews.title: Not Like Other Chaco's
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 pairs of Chaco flip flops and they fit identically. This pair was very loose so much so that I exchanged it for a smaller size and it's still too big. I'm not sure what the difference is. I haven't changed sizes. I'll go into a store to try on and purchase next time.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy4gsds

customer_reviews.title: The perfect flip!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the $$. I wore my last pair for 4 years until I spilled paint all over them, which means I just don't wear them in public anymore. I bought a cheaper replacement pair, and threw them in the trash 2 weeks later once my new chacos arrived. Very comfy and supportive. The perfect flip!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy007

customer_reviews.title: Fit, but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to these flips, but when I tried them on, they were really uncomfortable. I could distinctly feel the ball of fabric underneath my toes, making them uncomfortable to stand or walk in. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Best Flip Flops EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE! I've been looking for a replacement for my old Reef flip flops which I live in all summer long. But I have been unsuccessful in finding a flip flop that is supportive, well-fitting, good quality, and not too expensive. These flip flops fit the bill. I literally jumped up and down when I put them on. FINALLY! I found awesome flip flops. Thank you, Chaco!
customer_reviews.author: CarolynR

customer_reviews.title: Straps looser than desired
customer_reviews.text: Ok I ordered 9. The length is fine but the straps are loose, looser than I’d like. It kinda feels like they’ll slip off easily. May have to return them and try 8. I usually wear 8.5. Other than the size issue the quality is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Phoenix 12

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear through at least one pair of flip-flops a summer, but these Chacos have lasted me several years of constant abuse (I live in a climate where I can wear them year round). I think I had my first pair for 3 years, and just got a second pair because the straps were starting to fray a little. The old ones now live in my car as back-ups. They are comfortable and have good arch support. I normally wear an 8/8.5 (39 euro) in shoes, but take a 9 in Chacos.
customer_reviews.author: CMU

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy and Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. This is my second pair of flip flops from Chaco. They are light weight on my feet, the straps do not rub or irritate. All-around perfect casual flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn246

customer_reviews.title: Flip flop with an arch
customer_reviews.text: I am returning these although I was really excited about them. I usually wear and 8.5-9 in woman's and these were a 9 and couldn't fit these without my toes going over the top. So, I'm trying a 10! The style of them is great and the fact that they have an arch should really be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: meaghan van veen

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals so much that when my bag got ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals so much that when my bag got stolen over the weekend (and the sandals were inside) I had to buy a replacement pair immediately. They lasted me through 1.5 years in a developing country and 2 more years after that. Had they not gotten stolen, I'm sure they would have lasted even longer. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Smartladyinct

customer_reviews.title: Chacos are the best
customer_reviews.text: I've had Chaco sandles for almost 10 years now. My first pair of the flips finally started to wear out on the straps. They also were starting to smell, which no amount of washing or powders would help. I was a little sad to toss them out, because I loved the design of the straps. The new designs are too flashy or not my color, so I went with the black. Simple and classic. Buy these sandals, and your feet will love you for it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blisters
customer_reviews.text: Breaking them in was a beast. Blisters. I hope I am able to break them in to be able to continue to wear them. Unlike other Chacos, my feet felt tired and sore from wearing them all day. I am hoping that is the result of not walking properly due to blisters, and not the arch support being too firm.
customer_reviews.author: elaine nuzzaco

customer_reviews.title: Great support!
customer_reviews.text: I am very active and have plantar faciitis and metataralgia and have been in pain even with my custom made orthotics. I was desperate for relief. I ordered these and done others to compare and now own 3 pair of Chacos and when I'm in them my foot pain goes from a 10 to a 1. The shoe realigns my foot and gives it great arch support! I highly recommend these shoes. They are a little heavy for a flop, but thus I'd where the durability comes from. Thanks Chacos, this'll sound cheesy, but you really have improved my quality of life. I was in some pretty intense pain everyday. Not anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: The best flip-flop you will every buy
customer_reviews.text: Chaco flip-flops are substantial. They are sturdy, have support, and are overall great. While expensive by comparison to other flip flops, they are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Hurts the sole of your foot!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear for the summer, especially at the beach on vacation. The texture of the surface of the sole is so rough that my feet were getting chafed. I ended up having to buy a different brand in Hawaii. I am very disappointed, especially for the price of these. I have had good experience with Chaco's before, but I certainly won't buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: jenjen

customer_reviews.title: Very loose fit.
customer_reviews.text: Like all Chacos, these provide excellent arch support. However, the straps on this are very large for my foot and I could not keep them on at all. I do not see how these would fit anyone actually, unless they had a very fleshy foot. I would love some of these with either a stretchy strap or adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Strap came out
customer_reviews.text: The side strap pulled out when in the water. I'm so disappointed. I buy a pair every year. I've owned about 8 pairs. The last pair broke also right in the toe but may have been my fault I had a new puppy at the time. Anyway. I'll submit a picture soon
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price. Cute flip flops.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the quality and style of these flip flops but they were too wide. I returned them for a Chaco Maya sandal in black which is a perfect fit. I have a pair of Chaco sandals I've worn for at least 8 years so I'm a fan of the brand.
customer_reviews.author: KristiH

customer_reviews.title: I have been very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: I am a die-hard flip flop wearer, which has been tough since I have been dealing with plantar fasciitis. I have been very happy with these! The first day I wore them I got through the day and was amazed that I very little pain in my feet. I would highly recommend these. I will say that the first few times I wore them my toes had to adjust to the strap between them, but that problem was quickly resolved with use and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Brie Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great flip flop
customer_reviews.text: Great flip flop. They fit comfortably right out of the box. I had a flare up of my plantar fasciitis and they are helping me to keep from going barefoot around the house. My feet tend to run wide but the regular width fir perfectly
customer_reviews.author: mcsh

customer_reviews.title: Thought I was going to love these. I wanted a flip flop that was ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was going to love these. I wanted a flip flop that was going to outlast a few summers. The size (length wise) was true to size. The straps are just very loose and it feels like my foot just slides all around in this shoe. Chacos are normally heavier shoes and after buying these I have discovered that one strap will not hold them on your feet. If I had not already wore these I would send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Jadea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flip flops
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Chaco Flips, and I love them so much! I tried Chacos with the toe wrap thing, and I never could get them adjusted right. These are super comfortable and have the arch support I love in Chacos. They are a little heavy (which I like), so if you want super light shoes these aren't for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Nice but very wide
customer_reviews.text: I liked these but they are too wide for my foot. I am keeping them because I haven't seen where they offer narrow.
customer_reviews.author: L Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and so comfortable on my feet
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and so comfortable on my feet. This flip flop keeps my feet from tiring. Tread on the bottom is durable and long lasting. Glad I found them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting and foot-friendly
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair just like this for more than 5 years and decided to replace them since the soles were wearing out. These are exactly like the old ones, with the exception of color. It's worth it to pay more for flips that are durable and better for your feet than the cheap ones.
customer_reviews.author: S. Burrell

customer_reviews.title: CHACOS ROCK!
customer_reviews.text: I do love my Chacos. Wear them all the time. If you have a high arch, Chacos are worth the money! Plus they seriously last forever. I never have to replace my Chacos, and I beat them up pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Loved Product, but had to Return - Too Wide
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item because it was too wide for my narrow foot. Had it fit properly, I would have loved it and was sorry to return it. Unfortunately, Chaco does not make this in the width I need.
customer_reviews.author: DiviLyn

customer_reviews.title: They felt like I had to curl my toes to keep them ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm shocked these worked for so many people. The straps on these are WAY too large. They felt like I had to curl my toes to keep them on my feet while walking. Very uncomfortable. Was planning on wearing these to Disney but instead they are going straight back to Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: kat112

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my small feet...
customer_reviews.text: I have small (US size 5.5; Euro 35), narrow feet. Chacos are the ONLY shoes/sandals that consistently fit comfortably. They hold up extremely well and are of a classic design. Love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: mia coolpa

customer_reviews.title: Fit small
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 6 and it's a little small. I can wear it but it's not super comfortable and I'm afraid if I wear them for very long I might get a blister. But they are cute! And I'm hoping to break them in slowly
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and supportive
customer_reviews.text: The arch support is great. I love flip flops but my orthopedist does not want me wearing them. These are the most supportive flip flops I've found and my ankle has not bothered me since I started wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: nina99

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small...
customer_reviews.text: These seem to run small. I am normally a 6.5 to 7 in flip flops...I ordered a 7 and they were just too tight and even a little short on the back of my heel. I am returning for a size 8 and I am hoping they will fit perfectly because these are very supportive and comfy flip flops when they fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have a nice shape to them with arch support and a very small wedge heel. They are rock hard though. The size of the shoe is about right for the size, but the arch falls in the wrong spot making them very uncomfortable. They might be good shoes, but I wouldn't recommend buying them without trying them on at a store first.
customer_reviews.author: Rog&Deb

customer_reviews.title: Best flip flops ever!!
customer_reviews.text: after wearing cork bed sandals for years I decided to try Chaco flip flops... talk about comfortable... they haven't left my feet yet... I don't like wearing sneakers if I can help it... I read lots of reviews & decided to go up a size 9, they were too big... I sent them right away & within literally after 3 or 4 says my money was refunded... these flip flops are by far the most comfortable I've ever worn... don't get me wrong I loved my cork bed shoes... from now on I'm a Chaco girl... well worth the money...
customer_reviews.author: sharon b. wilson

customer_reviews.title: I did not like these flipflops
customer_reviews.text: I did not like these flipflops. I have pretty normal feet and these shoes have a significant, firm arch that tends to make me feel like my foot will turn outward and over. They are quite stiff which is typically okay but they are not for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: The first time I wore this flip it was just as comfortable as the ones I have owned for years.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Best flip flops ever!!
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down the best flip flops that I have ever owned! I will no longer purchase shoes without arch support and the support in these flips are amazing. The fabric straps are soft and comfy and they are tight enough that they don't allow for a lot of movement while walking. I don't feel like I have to clench my toes in order to keep them on and I can wear them all day long. There aren't any negative aspects in my opinion and I try to make sure that my reviews include both positives and negatives if it is warranted. I love these shoes and I would purchase them again for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: kelhe

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support and durable
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time I've purchased these flip flops. The first pair lasted for 5 years so I figured it is worth the prices to buy a new pair. These are the only flip flops I can wear anymore because of my flat feet. Great arch support and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Choice
customer_reviews.text: I am 100% satisfied with these flips. They look good and are comfortable. They offer stability while walking whether my feet are wet or dry.
customer_reviews.author: nancy rankin

customer_reviews.title: Light but very sturdy. Love them
customer_reviews.text: I've had versions of this sandal for many, many years. I wear the heck out of them and they have never let me down. Light but very sturdy. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Gwynavere

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: These flip flops are smarter than cheap flip flops. You get what you pay for. These are appropriate for places like Disneyland, where arch support is essential. They may seem expensive but my last pair lasted for ten summers.
customer_reviews.author: Woftail

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support for a flip flop
customer_reviews.text: I had an ankle problem that required support. I wanted a flip flop and needed to have support anytime I was on my feet. This shoe provided the support that I needed. I no longer have the ankle pain and my feet are comfortable and cool throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: MGWest

customer_reviews.title: great flip flop
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great flip flops. They are comfortable, durable, and reasonably priced (considering they can double as walking/hiking shoes.) No break in period, but they are comfortable and ready to rock from the first use. This style is light and more comfortable than other Chaco flips I've purchased in the past. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: webbing between big & #2 toes to wide for size 6 foot
customer_reviews.text: The webbing between big and #2 toe is wide. So wide, that for my foot (size 6), it hurt. Had to return these. Otherwise felt good.
customer_reviews.author: average-American

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best sandals I've ever bought. I used to wear cheap $5 flip flops which killed my feet, legs, etc. These have helped with all that pain. I even wear them around the house on my hardwood floors to help with foot pain!
customer_reviews.author: KKB

customer_reviews.title: These are great because they provide extra support
customer_reviews.text: I prefer to wear flip-flops every day, rain or shine. These are great because they provide extra support. I can wear them all day and not have any foot pain (which is a problem when I wear flip flops without arch support).
customer_reviews.author: BDemme

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love! I have rheumatoid arthritis and my podiatrist would love for me to always wear orthotics...but I'm a flip-flop kind of girl! These are so comfy and I can wear them all day without my feet giving me issues. Definitely not as much support as my regular chacos, but still great.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia E

customer_reviews.title: Hands down these are the best! My previous pair lasted 10 years until my ...
customer_reviews.text: Hands down these are the best! My previous pair lasted 10 years until my puppy got ahold of them :( ....this pair arrived quickly and are just as amazing as the ones before. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and the footbed provides comfortable support for my arches
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Page

customer_reviews.title: Straps to loose
customer_reviews.text: Straps are WAY to big/sloppy. Everything else good just the straps that hold your foot in place are too loose. Returned. Not the same old Chaco flips, to bad.....sad face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have a high arch and always have a hard time finding shoes that fit well. I also live in Arizona and I tend to wear flip flop type shoes 9-10 months out of the year. When my favorite black crocks broke my sister-in-law recommended these. I couldn't be happier and plan to buy them in all the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Valli B Dimmery

customer_reviews.title: The only flippy-floppies I'll ever buy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I each have a pair of these, and we love them. We got our first pairs in 2011 and they are still getting us around town! What flip-flop can you say has lasted three years? The tread is still there, the support, everything. Feels great on my feet - I have no arch and regular flip flops hurt my knees and back when I walk around in them too much. I don't get that pain with these. Support Galore! Chaco's are worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: HappyDays

customer_reviews.title: Best flip flops ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these for 7 yrs. Bought new ones after 5 yrs and a second pair. I wear them all day every day. I wear them to theme parks, the beach, long walks, in the rain, every where. My feet love them!!! Buy them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy D

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Chaco’s
customer_reviews.text: These are the best flip flops out there, a little pricy for a flip flop but they last for years.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: These were really an awkward fit. I had a ...
customer_reviews.text: These were really an awkward fit. I had a hard time keeping them on my feet. I returned them immediately.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Thank you so much I like the picture is great the way you let me ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much I like the picture is great the way you let me know about my package
customer_reviews.author: Luisa

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flip flops
customer_reviews.text: These are the best flipflops ever- they last for years - the sole is hardcore and the strap fabric holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Iversen

customer_reviews.title: Straps too wide for my small foot
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and these were highly recommended for that condition so I am very disappointed at the poor fit for my feet. I do like the feel of the arch support and the base of the flop is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cressy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Feel great and look great. Very comfortable and I ordered my usual size and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Love Chacos
customer_reviews.text: I had two pairs of this same flip. Happened to lose one shoe of my newer pair in a clutzy attempt to navigate a small stream with slippery rocks. Oh well. Had to order a replacement pair the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lee

customer_reviews.title: not your average flip flop
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of this shoe has more support and is more stable than regular flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: Revilo

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!!! They have rarely left my feet on the lake. In fact, I purchased another pair within 2 weeks in a colored pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna H. Mead

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!! I just ordered another pair to put up for next summer! I wear a 9-1/2 I ordered a 10. They fit great!
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: I love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals!! This is my second pair. The first pair I had for 5 years and they still fill great but are starting to look a little shabby. They have great arch support, which allow me to wear them all day without my feet hurting!!! I recommend them to everyone I know!!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: ... digs into the top of my foot causing a painful pressure point
customer_reviews.text: The design was changed since I last bought a pair and the top strap digs into the top of my foot causing a painful pressure point.
customer_reviews.author: MegaBeth

customer_reviews.title: wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond pleased with these flops. I go for long walks on gravelly sand up and down hills with no foot pain. I never thought a flop would be so durable.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C.

customer_reviews.title: I love these flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I love these flip flops. Got rid of all my other flip flops. After these I don't need any others honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love those Chaco's
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my wife, I thought it was about time, she has had a pair of Chacos for 9 years ! Wears them almost 80% of the time in the Summer and they still look great ! She says the fit is like no other, needless to say she loves them !
customer_reviews.author: Mark D Twain

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! So comfie! Have to wear in a bit in the arch but after a few weeks they are perfect! This was my second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: I had to order this shoe twice. First shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to order this shoe twice. First shoe delivered was white and black fabric. Had ordered black to begin with. Had to return it and order again and finally receive the color I originally ordered
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to slip on and go!
customer_reviews.text: Had to get used to these sandals. They are a little bit different than my other pair of Chaco sandals. Great arch support!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Big Foot over here.
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 9 shoe. I ordered a size 9 flop. It was an inch to big all the way around. The flip flops were comically large on my feet. I had to send them back
customer_reviews.author: christina desimone

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!!!! I owed a pair for 10 years and then one disappeared randomly. They were still in great shape after 10 years too and they are well worth the investment. Typically I am a size 7.5 but I ordered a size 7 since they don't sell these in half sizes! Thanks Chaco for for selling an amazing flip flop with great arch support!!!
customer_reviews.author: ctimmer

customer_reviews.title: so I knew what to expect and was not disappointed. No other flip flop I've tried has as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth or fifth pair of Chacos, so I knew what to expect and was not disappointed. No other flip flop I've tried has as much arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, I can wear these all day and not ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, I can wear these all day and not have achy feet at the end of the day, which says a lot for me!
customer_reviews.author: teripenn

customer_reviews.title: Great flip flops!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable flip flops that I have bought! They have an arch support on them. I will definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Duncan

customer_reviews.title: It was not very comfortable to walk in them
customer_reviews.text: The straps were very loose. It was not very comfortable to walk in them. Great quality of materials. Had the straps been more comfortable and snug I would be excited to wear them. I wish I could return them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: Chaco flip flops are the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: This pair feels a little smaller all around but I still prefer them to any other brand! Next time I'll order up a little.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I wear these around the house to support my back and hips from hard tile and wood floors. Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: they're the best. Especially for those who need arch support
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I've gotten. The first pair lasted five years, they're the best. Especially for those who need arch support!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Feels like you are standing on a tire
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is exactly as described. It has high arches, and very firm. It feels exactly like you are standing on a tire swing. Very hard, rubber, with lots of bumps on the footbed. If you are looking for a very firm sandal this is your sandal. I returned mine, my feet ached within the first hour.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Stanley

customer_reviews.title: perfect....great arch support
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I wanted! I let all my friends try them on....everyone loves them. The arch supports are perfect, no other sandal I know of has arch supportive them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Chacos but this design didnt fit my foot well
customer_reviews.text: I love Chacos but this design didnt fit my foot well. My foot moved around a lot in it and the fabric was rough and rubbed between my toes. I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: megan smith

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these for 2 years straight (I really need to get another pair). I developed planter facsitis and these helped me so much. I am on feet all day as a stay at home mom and these have been a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: STACEY MOTT

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. Very simple but cute and easy to wear around the house for good support on my back
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Branham

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sandals. I had to buy another pair after ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sandals. I had to buy another pair after my dog chewed of the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Dack

customer_reviews.title: I love my Chaco flips
customer_reviews.text: I love my Chaco flips! I’ve been wearing them for years. I wear them year round as my house shoes and in warm weather they’re my go to sandals. When they begin to show some wear, they become my gardening shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Bacurin

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! This is my second pair.....wore my last pair for 5 years until the souls were thinning out and the toe straps were separating.....they were 8s...a bit too big, I am a 7.5. My new ones are 7s and just perfect! Bought striped split toe socks to wear with them on colder days. :O) These shoes are my faves...wear them around the house also as they are better for me than bare floors and flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn H.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: These are my wife's favorite sandals. She uses them in a marine environment, and they hold up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: JimCool

customer_reviews.title: Flips Are Addictive
customer_reviews.text: Just love these sandals. When I got my first pair I thought I would never get used to the texture of the eco tread bottoms where your foot rests I was used to smooth Chaco bottoms. It didn't take long, they really feel like they are massaging my feet. My dog got one of the of my black flips and chewed the strap, I had to re-order the same say, can't live without my Flip's they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy soles
customer_reviews.text: I love the arch & soles of the shoe. The straps are rubbing and hurting the top of my foot but I'm hoping I just need to break them in to soften the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: E. Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Love my Chaco flip flops! They're the most supporting comfortable sandals I own!
customer_reviews.author: 78wv

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable flip flops and they DO provide good arch support.
customer_reviews.author: E.F.

product_meta.title: Chaco womens EcotreadÂ¿ flip flop sandals, Black, 6 US
product_meta.description: Since 1989, Chaco has been creating great fitting product that outlast the competition - footwear that can be repaired rather than pitched into a landfill. Chaco focuses on fit, function, comfort and quality with a full line of footwear, including hiking and river sandals, free-heel casual sandals, flips and new for 2007 a children's collection. All Chaco footwear features a biocentric footbed and has received the APMA Seal of Acceptance. Chaco maintains a triple bottom line of people, planet and profit, donating 3% of after-tax profits to organizations dedicated to caring for people and the planet.
feature_bullets: LUVSEAT platform centers the foot's shock-absorbing pad under the heel and supports the arch.
Webbed polyester upper helps hold the foot in place, enhancing stability.
Non-marking EcoTread rubber outsole stands up to wear and tear with long-lasting durability.
Polyester webbing upper, polyurethane midsole, EcoTread rubber outsole.
Care: Machine wash cold on gentle cycle. Air dry only.
